name: :book: [guide] ASP.NET Core web apps
description: ASP.NET Core web apps architecture guidance

name: :book: [guide] Framework Design Guidelines
description: Indicates issues that are related to the Framework Design Guidelines book

name: :book: [guide] Modernizing w/ Windows containers
description: Modernizing w/ Windows containers architecture guidance

name: :card_file_box: [tech] Async Task
description: Task Asynchronous Protocol (TAP), or async / await features

name: :card_file_box: [tech] Roslyn APIs
description: Issues related to the .NET Compiler Platform SDK

name: :card_file_box: [tech] Security
description: Issues related to security practices for .NET developers

name: :card_file_box: [tech] WF
description: Issues related to Windows Workflow in .NET

name: :card_file_box: [tech] WIF
description: Issues or PRs related to Windows Information Foundation

name: :card_file_box: [tech] WinForms
description: Issues that relate to Windows Forms

name: :card_file_box: [tech] WPF
description: Issues that relate to Windows Presentation Foundation or XAML

name: :file_folder: [repo] docs
description: Issue is related to the docs repo.

name: :file_folder: [repo] ml-api-docs
description: Issue is related to the external ml-api-docs repo.

name: :file_folder: [repo] roslyn-api-docs
description: Issue is related to the external roslyn-api-docs repo.

name: :file_folder: [repo] samples
description: Issue is related to the external samples repo.

name: :hammer: Waiting on feedback
description: Issue cannot continue until we get feedback from product team or expert [state][status]

name: :hammer: Backlog [on hold]
description: Issue has been assigned to the backlog and is on hold until added to a sprint. [state][status]

name: :hammer: Under investigation
description: This is being looked at and investigated with the customer [state][status]

name: :hammer: Blocked
description: Issue is on hold because something is blocking [state][status]

name: :hammer: Needs more info
description: Need more information from the user [state][status]

name: :warning: Discussion
description: Issue is being used to discuss something related to the article [type][problem]

name: :warning: Needs update
description: The article needs to be updated with new information [type][problem]

name: :warning: Site problem
description: Issue is related to the docs website [type][problem]

name: :heavy_check_mark: Fixed in PR
description: Issue has been resolved and will be closed. [resolved][resolution]

name: :heavy_check_mark: Info provided
description: Issue was related to needing more information but did change the article. [resolved][resolution]

name: :heavy_check_mark: Duplicate
description: Issue is a duplicate of another. Linked to issue in comment. [resolved][resolution]

name: :heavy_check_mark: Won't fix
description: This issue is not going to fixed and instead will be closed. [resolved][resolution]

name: Source - Docs.ms
description: Issue came from the docs github feedback channel. [extra]

name: :apple: 1st-time docs contributor!
description: Indicates PRs from new contributors to the docs repository [extra]

name: +:construction:+ Hold for related PR
description: Indicates a PR can only be merged when other related PRs are merged (see comments for links) [extra]

name: P0
description: Critical issue that must be worked on asap. [priority]

name: P2
description: Normal priority issue. Good for community to help out on. [priority]

name: P3
description: Never going to be worked on unless a community member wants to help . [priority]
